DOC.brief_summary: The purpose trial compare pharmacokinetic characteristic YHD1119 ( Pregabalin 300mg ) Lyrica capsule ( Pregabalin 150mg ) . YHD1119 control release formulation make Yuhan Corporation . Primary endpoint Cmax , s AUCtau secondary endpoint AUClast , s , AUCinf , s , Tmax , s t1/2 .
DOC.brief_title: A Open-label , Randomized , Crossover Study Assess PK Pregabalin
DOC.criteria: 19~50 year old , healthy male volunteer > 55Kg ( Body weight ) 18.5 < BMI < 28 AST ALT > 3 * Upper normal range ( Lab ) Total bilirubin > 2.0 mg/dl Systolic BP > 140 OR < 90 , Diastolic BP > 100 OR < 60
